name: Together We Lift
description:
This is a project in game jam.

Our team:

Zixing Liu (Demi) - ArtCenter - ENTD Game Design Track (Term2)

Programmer / Artist / Animator / UI Designer / Game Designer

Xueyun Zhang (Konnor) -ArtCenter - ENTD Game Design Track (Term2)

Narrative Designer / Programmer / Animator / UI Designer / Game Designer

Jianjun Liu (Leo) - ArtCenter - Illustration (Term8)

Artist

Jialin Zhu (Galina) -ArtCenter- Interaction Design (Fall2021)

Audio Designer

This game is inspired from Giant ship blocking Suez canal. The theme of this game jam is better together. Player as a digger needs to collect electric parts and gain power from other people. With power of crowd, the small digger will become stronger enough to move giant ship.
